synopsis.text: The magical land of Kamitsumihara, a place where myths and legends persist, is guarded by the esteemed Kamiazuma clan. Touka Kamiazuma, an adopted member of the family, finds his mundane existence upturned with the arrival of Momoka Kawakabe, a young girl grappling with amnesia. Despite Touka's reserved demeanor and preference for solitude, Momoka remains resolute in her desire to spend time with him, eventually joining the Kamiazuma clan. Their fateful encounter triggers a series of events that resurrect an ancient legend, intertwining their destinies with the land's dark secrets and age-old tragedies. As the current bearer of the mythical stone sword, Sekiken, Touka must navigate the complexities of his newfound connection to Momoka and unravel the truth behind the land's chaotic past, all while striving to maintain a semblance of normalcy in their everyday lives.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
